attributes.action: I wish to make it illegal for spoons not to play tunes
attributes.additional_details: Scene as all the clubs are currently shut, I feel like we need somewhere good to have a beer And listen to some good music. I feel like it would really increase the country’s morale if u could implement this law
attributes.background: I want to make a law that states it is illegal for all weatherspoons restaurants (after 9pm in the current Climate) not to play tunes.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
